alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued September 02 at 4:23AM PDT until September 02 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High temperatures in the upper 90s to low 100s expected. This will pose a moderate risk for heat-related illness. * WHERE...Okanogan, Telma, Leavenworth, Omak, Monse, Cashmere, Nighthawk, Winton, Dryden, Nespelem, Oroville, Entiat, Wenatchee, Peshastin, Malott, Plain, Brewster, Mansfield, Palisades, Chelan, Bridgeport, and Waterville. * WHEN...From Noon today to 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures will increase the risk for heat-related illnesses, especially for those without efficient cooling or adequate hydration.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area
